verses.name: Hosea 11:10
verses.text: They shall walk after the Lord: he shall roar like a lion: when he shall roar, then the children shall tremble from the west.

verses.name: Hosea 11:11
verses.text: They shall tremble as a bird out of Egypt, and as a dove out of the land of Assyria: and I will place them in their houses, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Hosea 11:12
verses.text: Ephraim compasseth me about with lies, and the house of Israel with deceit: but Judah yet ruleth with God, and is faithful with the saints.
